mapper.select: SELECT DISPLAY_NO, DISPLAY_NAME, DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO FROM DISPLAY JOIN GALLERY ON(DISPLAY.GALLERY_NO = GALLERY.GALLERY_NO) WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN DISPLAY_START_DATE AND DISPLAY_END_DATE ORDER BY DISPLAY_NO

SELECT D.DISPLAY_NO, D.DISPLAY_NAME, D.DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, G.GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO, D.DISPLAY_STATUS, A.CHANGE_NAME AS IMAGE_PATH, COUNT(L.DISPLAY_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT
FROM DISPLAY D LEFT JOIN GALLERY G ON(D.GALLERY_NO = G.GALLERY_NO) LEFT JOIN DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT A ON(D.DISPLAY_NO = A.DISPLAY_NO AND A.IMAGE_LEVEL = 1) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" L ON (D.DISPLAY_NO = L.DISPLAY_NO) WHERE D.DISPLAY_STATUS != '종료' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN D.DISPLAY_START_DATE AND D.DISPLAY_END_DATE group by D.DISPLAY_NO, D.DISPLAY_NAME, D.DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)'), TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)'), G.GALLERY_NAME, D.DISPLAY_STATUS, A.CHANGE_NAME

SELECT D.DISPLAY_NO, D.DISPLAY_NAME, D.DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, G.GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO, D.DISPLAY_STATUS, A.CHANGE_NAME AS IMAGE_PATH FROM DISPLAY D JOIN GALLERY G ON(D.GALLERY_NO = G.GALLERY_NO) LEFT JOIN DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT A ON(D.DISPLAY_NO = A.DISPLAY_NO AND A.IMAGE_LEVEL = 1) WHERE D.DISPLAY_STATUS != '종료' AND D.DISPLAY_START_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY D.DISPLAY_START_DATE

SELECT D.DISPLAY_NO, D.DISPLAY_NAME, D.DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, G.GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO, D.DISPLAY_STATUS, A.CHANGE_NAME AS IMAGE_PATH FROM DISPLAY D JOIN GALLERY G ON(D.GALLERY_NO = G.GALLERY_NO) LEFT JOIN DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT A ON(D.DISPLAY_NO = A.DISPLAY_NO AND A.IMAGE_LEVEL = 1) WHERE D.DISPLAY_STATUS != '종료' AND D.DISPLAY_START_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY D.DISPLAY_START_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT( ATTACHMENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, IMAGE_LEVEL, DISPLAY_NO) VALUES(SEQ_DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{imageLevel}, SEQ_DISPLAY_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT DISPLAY_NAME, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, DISPLAY_CONTENT, GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO FROM DISPLAY JOIN GALLERY ON(DISPLAY.GALLERY_NO = GALLERY.GALLERY_NO) WHERE DISPLAY_NO = (SELECT MAX(DISPLAY_NO) FROM DISPLAY WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS = '진행')

SELECT DISPLAY_NO, DISPLAY_NAME, DISPLAY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, DISPLAY_PRICE, DISPLAY_STATUS, ARTIST_NICKNAME AS ARTIST_NO, GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NO FROM DISPLAY D JOIN ARTIST A USING(ARTIST_NO) JOIN GALLERY G USING(GALLERY_NO) WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS != '종료' AND DISPLAY_NO = #{dno}
SELECT * FROM DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT A JOIN DISPLAY D USING(DISPLAY_NO) WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS != '종료' AND DISPLAY_NO = #{dno}

SELECT DISPLAY_NO, DISPLAY_NAME, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DAY)') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE FROM DISPLAY WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS = '진행' ORDER BY DISPLAY_NO
SELECT A.* FROM DISPLAY_ATTACHMENT A JOIN DISPLAY D ON(A.DISPLAY_NO = D.DISPLAY_NO) WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS = '진행' AND IMAGE_LEVEL = '1' ORDER BY A.DISPLAY_NO
SELECT * FROM DISPLAY WHERE ARTIST_NO =#{artistNo} ORDER BY DISPLAY_NO DESC
SELECT DISPLAY_NO, DISPLAY_NAME, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DISPLAY_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DISPLAY_END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DISPLAY_END_DATE, DISPLAY_STATUS FROM DISPLAY
